archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: SAR ESA Reviewer Interface
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
This describes the interface provided for members of the Enterprise Security Architecture team to:
1. Review and edit responses. 2. Comment the responses that are provided within reviews. 3. Completely remove a submitted review.
Any changes to the answers will result in the scoring being changed as well and reflected in the SAR2 Power BI Dashboard.
Setting a 'Review Date' is a requirement for saving the changes.
